verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a harvest coming
For the kingdom of God to be born
There's a harvest coming
Now the weed still grows with the corn

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
I am convinced
The hard times we have to share
Cannot compare
To all the joy
And good times there is to come
See you there!
